metadata.name: Uncommon One Time Only Scheduled Task At 00:00
metadata.comment: Detects scheduled task creation events that include suspicious actions, and is run once at 00:00

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('schtasks.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vbscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('once')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('00:00')))

output.summary: Detects scheduled task creation events that include suspicious actions, and is run once at 00:00
